Indicate if the following statement is true, false or uncertain.
Humanoid robots will take over the world by 2030.

The statement is uncertain. While humanoid robots are advancing rapidly and are expected to play a more significant role in various industries by 2030, predicting that they will take over the world by that time is speculative. Numerous factors, including technological, ethical, and regulatory considerations, will influence the extent to which humanoid robots are integrated into society.
